revised_title: Exploring Modularity and Branching Patterns in Organisms
tldr: This article discusses the concept of modularity and branching patterns in organisms, focusing on the use of computer simulations to model and understand these complex systems. The author explores the different approaches to modeling branching organisms and highlights the importance of understanding the nature of control in new branch initiation for both real and artificial branching patterns.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Organism Development
